programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2022
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and take a short trip back to 2022!

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep50
programme.desc: The Time Disruptor - Archibald accidentally uses Loy’s time travel device, embarking on an adventure through past, present and future. But when the device breaks, he’ll need to find a way to get back home without disrupting the space-time continuum. / When Archibald returns from his journey through time he’s heartbroken to learn that he’s no longer the wearer of his beloved sweater. Now, he must travel back through time to correct his mistake before he loses his identity forever.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep6
programme.desc: Caved And Confused - When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep5
programme.desc: It'S A Wonderful Larp / My Sectional Romance - Audrey’s obsession with fun gets her too wrapped up in the Bloogey Boys’ LARPing game. The Harvey Girls and Bloogey Boys battle over who’s the rightful owner of a cool couch.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep5
programme.desc: Ants Ants Revolution / Clamsquatch - A group of fire ants swarm the city and it's up to Burn to race their leader in order to get them to leave. However, a worried Chet gets in the way. // The crew travels to Mississippi for a race in the swamp. When Skidmark goes missing, they fear he has been taken by a creepy mythological creature.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome To Harmony Harbor - Ari moves in to Harmony Harbor, but notices something strange involving a group of kids, a Noodle Truck chef and her pet squirrel. / After Ari discovers the secret of Team Zenko Go, he asks to join the crew. But first he must learn the importance of teamwork.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep50
programme.desc: The Time Disruptor - Archibald accidentally uses Loy’s time travel device, embarking on an adventure through past, present and future. But when the device breaks, he’ll need to find a way to get back home without disrupting the space-time continuum. / When Archibald returns from his journey through time he’s heartbroken to learn that he’s no longer the wearer of his beloved sweater. Now, he must travel back through time to correct his mistake before he loses his identity forever.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep27
programme.desc: Wormhole / Ear Worm - Following the events of the “Branch Bum,” the Trolls become lost in a series of wormholes, each of which leads to a new and strange alternate world. The Snack Pack must work together in order to find their way back home/In order to psych the Snack Pack up for collecting the confetti from Confetti-fest, DJ Suki unveils the catchiest song ever written. But when the song proves a little too catchy, Poppy will do anything to help get the song out of her friends’ heads.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep12
programme.desc: A Stinky Situation /Fire-Fly - When Twig gets sprayed by a skunk trying to save his friends, the Mighty Ones agree not to ruin his hero moment by telling him that the stinks. Instead, they try to wash the smell off of him without him knowing. / The Mighty Ones are cold so when they hear about a wonderful creature known as a "fire-fly," they decide it will be the answer to their problems.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Bombastic Blathering Of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Crazy Caustic Spray Of The Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep1
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 1 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object filled with secrets during their search for Dagur the Deranged.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep2
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 2 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders journey to Glacier Island in search of the Snow Wraith, a fearsome dragon that holds key to the Dragon Eye's mysteries.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep7
programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep8
programme.desc: Into The Belly Of The Den Of The House Of The Nest Of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter The Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays With Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep29
programme.desc: The Hunted - Lotor seizes the opportunity and lures the Paladins to Thayserix, a mysterious gas planet

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep29
programme.desc: Gorgey Girl / A Gran Adventure - Eep has the first pen pal in Gulp Gorge/Gran sends Ugga and Eep on the first treasure hunt when she decides to pass on her inheritance

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep29
programme.desc: Citizen Brain / Lair Liar Pods On Fire - The Big Brain Boov recruit Oh to join them; Oh is introduced to the concept of "harmless lying," and lies so much that he is unable to distinguish between fact and fiction

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep29
programme.desc: Pea Dummy / Mary Anning - When Peabody and Sherman take an intelligence test, Peabody can't believe he scores much lower than Sherman and desperately tries to figure out why

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep29
programme.desc: Lucky And The Big Goodbye - While Lucky attempts to win over a town that is unwelcoming to the circus, she starts to question her own reasoning to stay

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep16
programme.desc: Buster Move / Gills! - Smoove Move is embarrassed when his nerdy brother comes to visit.// Skidmark causes a panic when he hunts a snail-eating goldfish at a fancy party.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep5
programme.desc: Why Hen Pecks The Ground - You see there was a time when Hen didn't peck the ground. She was a proud mother who spent all her time looking after and cleaning her chicks. Fancy pancy Peacock upsets Mama Hen and makes her feel plain. All the animals are furious with Snooty Peacock… but the damage has been done. Eagle – Mama Hen's best friend – decides to lend Hen her most prized possession – A needle! And Mama Hen sews herself the most beautiful coat of new feathers. Everyone is delighted and they dance and dance and dance. But Mama Hen forgets all about the needle and it gets lost in all the dust. Eagle's precious needle! From that day on Hen always pecks the ground looking for the needle to return to her friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep6
programme.desc: Why Bat Hangs Upside Down - You see there was a time when Bat didn't hang upside down. He used to fly all over Tinga Tinga, saying ‘Boo!' to all the animals and giving them a fright. Nothing could be more fun for Bat. But one day Bat went too far… and the animals decided to give Bat a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep57
programme.desc: King Stingo - Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isn't long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep58
programme.desc: Hide And Seek - The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifi's delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep5
programme.desc: Who Did I Hear In The Big Hollow Log? - Jess is searching for Horace by the pond but he's nowhere to be found. When he calls into a hollow log and his voice echo's back, Jess thinks it's the voice of a new friend and sets about trying to work out where the friend is. By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep6
programme.desc: What Can We Do With Mimi'S Rubbish? - Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep42
programme.desc: Scrapbookmobile / Troll Rangers - When Biggie accidentally destroys a beloved scrapbook, he and Poppy set out to replace it by having a scrapbook-worthy adventure./ CJ Suki and Priscilla embark on a journey to earn Junior Troll Ranger patches for mastering Trolly activities.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Taxing Trauma Of The Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Taxing Trauma Of The Treacherous Tattle Trials Part Ii - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive'S Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio De La Niñera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep58
programme.desc: Before They Hatch - A gargoyle with ties to San Lorenzo emerges from the portal and Puss must help find her hidden eggs before they hatch and feed on whatever or whoever is around!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep32
programme.desc: The Jungle Games - After making a bet against Uncle King Julien, King Julien must win the "Jungle Games" in order to maintain control of the royal crown.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep18
programme.desc: Mini Mayhem In Moscow - Whitebeard uses the Grow Key to make himself 40' tall. But the key breaks! So the Wanderers take the key to Wizard Fix-It in Moscow. While fixing the key, Fix-It accidentally makes Waldo, Wenda and herself two inches tall! So begins a Nutcracker-like mini-adventure in Moscow to retrieve the key from Odlulu and Fritz.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep12
programme.desc: Frank And Beans With Chili / Little Hound On The Prairie - Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. Tag’s ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep2
programme.desc: Delivery Disaster / Slippery Business - When Donna's delivery truck breaks down, it's up to the crew to help Donna continue delivering packages to Harmony Harbor's residents. / When the crew takes on a mission to rescue a lost pet, Ellie must face her fears in order to help save the day.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep25
programme.desc: The Case Of The Torn-Out Pages - Someone's ripped out the final pages of Queen Sparklewings Fairytale book! Who could it be ? Noddy needs to find out fast and restore the pages to the book or the Queen's special fairytale storytelling will be cancelled.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep26
programme.desc: The Case Of The Bird That Can'T Fly - Noddy finds a bird in Pat-Pat's Treehouse that doesn't seem to be able to fly. He decides to investigate: how can they help the bird to fly? Noddy finds out that the bird can fly – it just doesn't want to. But why ?

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep39
programme.desc: Win A Day With Nitro Ned / Lil' Chickies - Archibald wins a contest and gets the opportunity to spend an entire day with his hero: NITRO NED! But when it turns out Ned is in dire need of a day off, Archibald helps to find him a replacement. / After a lotion related mishap, Archibald accidentally turns himself and his family into younger versions of themselves.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep7
programme.desc: Eep-Over / Thunkytown - When Eep has the first-ever sleepover, scary noises and shadows send the girls screaming out of the cave; Thunk saves the day when Bear Owls invade.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep6
programme.desc: Cereal / Tiny Danger - The Harvey street kids set out to solve the mystery of who stole their one of a kind cereal! Lotta fights back when Tiny is told that he’s too small to race in a bike race.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep6
programme.desc: Turbo Stinks / Snails In Jail - On the day Turbo unveils a new cologne he has created, birds suddenly start attacking the city and it's up to the crew to figure out how to get rid of the feathery menaces before anyone gets eaten/Travelling through the desert to visit a kid snail who is sick, the crew runs afoul of a villainous sheriff who puts them in jail until Turbo agrees to throw a race.

programme.desc: Delivery Disaster / Slippery Business - When Donna's delivery truck breaks down, it's up to the crew to help Donna continue delivering packages to Harmony Harbor's residents. / When the crew takes on a mission to rescue a lost pet, Ellie must face her fears in order to help save the day.

programme.desc: Don'T Worry Be Peppy / Two'S A Cloud - When Poppy worries that her father doesn’t feel useful now that’s he’s no longer King, she asks her friends to bring Peppy small problems to solve. But will Peppy be able to face a real threat, in the form of a swamp monster?/When Cloud Guy moves into Branch’s bunker, Branch will do whatever it takes to get his unwanted roommate to leave- including inviting his annoying cloud parents over.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep13
programme.desc: Mr. Ladybug'S Secret/Wetyard - When Rabbit blackmails Mr. Ladybug into doing one last job for him, Berry wants in on the action. / The backyard gets flooded, so Rocksy forms a crew out of the Mighty Ones and search for dry land.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep2
programme.desc: Sphinx - Puss accidentally gives the orphans a magic substance that will ultimately make them explode. The only cure is guarded by a Sphinx who challenges Puss with riddles - and contrary to his own belief, Puss is not good at riddles.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Trashy Tale Of The Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Taxing Trauma Of The Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep3
programme.desc: Imperfect Harmony - The Dragon Riders discover a lush island that turns out to be the home of the Deathsong, a massive dragon that threatens to trap them forever.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep4
programme.desc: When Darkness Falls - On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover its indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.

programme.desc: Chercophonie / Oh, Man, And The Sea - Tip becomes a Boovsland rock icon due to her awful guitar playing; When Donny takes Oh fishing, they battle a giant Sturgeon

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep30
programme.desc: Climate Control / Ziryab - When Hobson gives Peabody and Sherman a weather-controlling device, they can't agree on a temperature and cause a massive storm flood in the Penthouse

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep30
programme.desc: Lucky And The Two-Wheeled Terror - When Lucky and the PALs arrive home from the circus, they find that Maricela and her new bicycle have become the star attraction in Miradero

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep17
programme.desc: The Terror Of Tickula / Prank'D - Turbo and Whiplash meet a strange tick who may be out to harm Turbo.//When the crew starts a prank war, Chet is nervous that he is the next target.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep7
programme.desc: Why Warthog Is Ugly - You see there was a time when Warthog was really rather handsome. And did he know it! He strutted around Tinga Tinga as if he owned the place. All the animals were fed up with Warthog's boasting, and then one day Lion decided to give chase. Yikes! Warthog ran headfirst into Porcupines burrow! After that, he was no longer the prettiest beast in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep8
programme.desc: Why Owls Head Turns All The Way Round - You see there was a time when Owl's head didn't turn all the way round. She had tiny little eyes and tiny little ears, and she found it very hard to stay awake. Then one day all the Mangoes started disappearing in Tinga Tinga. Against all the animals better judgement, Owl was ordered to watch over the Mango tree … but the mangoes kept disappearing. Desperate to catch the thief, Owl stretched and strained to see who was stealing the precious mangoes, until Ker-Swhing! Her head turned all the way round and she saw who it was… It was the ants! From that day on Owl was made the official night guard of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep59
programme.desc: My Friend Fifi - Fifi and Bumble fall out in a big way after Fifi doesn't show up to the picnic they are supposed to have together. How strange that Stingo is trying to get them to be friends again, or is it?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep60
programme.desc: Diggly'S Big Adventure - Diggly is bored of life on his compost heap and wants to see round the rest of the garden. Fifi offers to give him a guided tour. Diggly gets lost, how will he get home?

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep7
programme.desc: Who Wants To Live In Baa'S Meadow? - Baa's feeling lonely as his buddy Billie the mouse has gone off for the day. Jess goes hunting for someone to come to the meadow to live with Baa. He find a fish to live in the trough, but there's no pond weed for him to live, he tries Sammy snail but he carries his own home on his back so he doesn't need a new home, finally they realise that there are ants already living with Baa in the meadow.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep8
programme.desc: Why Are The Ants Visiting Mimi? - Mimi's painting a lovely picture at her hutch, with Jess along for a visit. Suddenly she's collapses in fits of tickly giggles, there are ants everywhere.. Mimi can't paint, tho, whilst she's being tickled and Jess works out they are here for her honey sandwiches!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who'S There?/Tour Guide Of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep234
programme.desc: Dens - Peppa is playing in the tree-house with the girls, and George and the boys stay in the castle that Grandpa Pig built for them. But when it starts to rain and the garden is covered in muddy puddles, they rush out to play together!

programme.desc: The Paperplane Race - Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep212

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep235
programme.desc: Grandpa's Little Train - Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called “Gertrude” and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop aboard. Peppa and George think that “Gertrude” is the very best train in the whole world

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep231
programme.desc: The Cycle Ride - Peppa and her family are going for a day’s cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she’s not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa’s friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep236
programme.desc: School Bus Trip - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her school friends on a school bus trip to the mountains. From the top of the mountains there is a fantastic view and Peppa and her friends have fun hearing echoes. After a great day out, the bus takes the children home

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep237
programme.desc: Rebecca Rabbit - Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbit’s house today. It is a bit different to Peppa’s house; it is inside a hill, with tunnels instead of stairs. They enjoy playing rabbits and everyone is surprised when George discovers he likes carrots!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep238
programme.desc: The baby Piggy - Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;

programme.desc: Babysitting - Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep131

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep132
programme.desc: Thunderstorm - Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep244

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep203

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep252
programme.desc: Stars - It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep134
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep135
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep703
programme.desc: The Super Skateboard - It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep702
programme.desc: Mail Truck Blaze - When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep822
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitties and the Kiddies / Pups Save the Green House - Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep824
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies - Wally the Walrus searches all over Adventure Bay for Cap'n Turbot and turns the town upside-down in the process. // Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Sorry Not Sorry - Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work - Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? // Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards - Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Computer - Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter - Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Baby Alexander - Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep619
programme.desc: The Fastest Feather Race! - In the Fastest Feather in the Race, it's Team Flightless versus cocky Amelia the Peregrine Falcon. Though Penguin Nonny, Ostrich Oona, and Kiwi Goby can't fly, these birds of a feather flock together! Will teamwork be enough to win the trophy?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Blue's Big Beat Band - Josh and Blue are starting a band! As we play Blue's Clues to find out what instrument Blue will play, we form our very own house band, learn rhythms, identify tempos, and sing, tap, and clap all day long.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Thankful with Blue - Josh is making a Thankful Book and is looking to find out what our friends in the Blue's Clue's house are thankful. We play Blue's Clues to find out what Blue is thankful for and learn about patience and sharing on the way.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Finceañera - Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Santiago and Bonnie to the Rescue - After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: The Welcome Wagon - When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Call Me Billiam - When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Pups Save the Squirrels - The PAW Patrol is on a roll when squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse causing it to fall onto Daring Danny's skateboard!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep826
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Big Leak / Pups Save a Baby Anteater / Pups Save a Hatch Day / Pups Save the Munchie Mobile - The Pups rescue Francois from a water tower geyser. // The Pups rescue a baby anteater stuck on a bucking RoboHorse. // The Pups rescue Ace and her special delivery for Chickaletta's party. // The Pups rescue Mr. Porter and his stranded Food Truck.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep67
programme.desc: Tickly - The Teletubbies enjoy doing 'Round and Round the Garden', especially the end of the rhyme where they all tickle each other. The Tiddlytubbies have tickly fun too.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Boat - Dee encourages a friend to say boat and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Pack Up And Go - Po has to pack up his home so another Po can move into the house before sun down - and he needs help!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep35
programme.desc: It's Time for a Community Newsletter - Great Gran Gran shows JoJo her St Lucian local newsletter, and they are inspired to make their own community newsletter to tell everyone in the local area what's going on.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep10
programme.desc: The Beautiful Game - Monty, Jimmy Jones and Stan are preparing to play a game of soccer, but when they realise they don't have the proper gear to play, Stan abandons the match, leaving Monty questioning whether you can only play a game if you have all the correct equipment.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Half a Pair - After playing in the mud, Monty and Stan decide to give Jimmy Jones a bath, but when Stan can only find one glove from his pair, he tells Monty that half a pair of something is useless, leading Monty to wonder if there are any other uses for a half of a pair.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Queens - During a game of Queens, Bluey and Bingo find that playing the butler is much more fun. But someone must play the queen, even if it means not being afraid of a bit of hard work.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep16

programme.title: UFC 289: Nunes vs. Aldana
programme.desc: Prelims - In a year of excellence, Mexico may see its fourth world champion crowned. In the UFC’s return to Canada on June 10, Guadalajara’s Irene Aldana challenges Brazil’s Amanda Nunes for the UFC bantamweight title in the main event of UFC 289 at Vancouver’s Rogers Arena. Last July, the “Lioness” evened the score with Julianna Pena, regaining her title and setting up a meeting with Aldana, whose fight-altering power has led her to wins over Macy Chiasson, Yana Santos and Ketlen Vieira. Plus, in the co-main event, it’s a pivotal clash in the lightweight division when former champ Charles Oliveira battles surging contender Beneil Dariush

programme.title: UFC 289: Nunes vs. Aldana
programme.desc: Main Event - In a year of excellence, Mexico may see its fourth world champion crowned. In the UFC’s return to Canada on June 10, Guadalajara’s Irene Aldana challenges Brazil’s Amanda Nunes for the UFC bantamweight title in the main event of UFC 289 at Vancouver’s Rogers Arena. Last July, the “Lioness” evened the score with Julianna Pena, regaining her title and setting up a meeting with Aldana, whose fight-altering power has led her to wins over Macy Chiasson, Yana Santos and Ketlen Vieira. Plus, in the co-main event, it’s a pivotal clash in the lightweight division when former champ Charles Oliveira battles surging contender Beneil Dariush

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep902BlachowiczvsAdesanya
programme.desc: At UFC 259, middleweight champion Israel Adesanya stepped up in weight as he sought a second belt taking on newly minted light heavyweight champion Jan Blachowicz. See both men train and prepare for their battle for 205-pound gold

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep1
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep28
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep9
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Submissions
programme.desc: Debuts - Earning a submission victory inside the famed UFC Octagon takes skills and talent that few possess. UFC Ultimate Submissions brings you a collection of the greatest grappling finishes the MMA world has ever seen.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2314
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Grande Prémio Tissot de Portugal Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Nestled in the beautiful setting of Portugal’s Algarve, the 100,000 capacity Autodromo Internacional do Algarve – known more colloquially as Portimao, after the port city it sits half an hour outside – was opened on the 2nd of November, 2008. The circuit was inaugurated by WorldSBK when they headed to Portugal for their final round of that season – but it’s not just a racetrack. The Algarve Motorsports Park is a state-of-the-art complex which boasts the stunning race track, a go-kart track, an off-road park, a hotel, an apartment complex, a technology park and a sports complex – it really is the bee’s knees.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2314
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vettori vs. Cannonier
programme.desc: Prelims - Top five contenders intent on keeping their hopes for a middleweight championship alive, Marvin Vettori and Jared Cannonier square off in the main event of UFC on ESPN on June 18 at the APEX in Las Vegas. Fresh from a win over rising star Roman Dolidze, Italy’s Vettori is determined to not let anyone pass him on the road to top, but he will have to survive the thunder thrown at him by Cannonier, who owns knockout victories over Anderson Silva, Jack Hermansson and Derek Brunson

programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Grande Prémio Tissot de Portugal Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Nestled in the beautiful setting of Portugal’s Algarve, the 100,000 capacity Autodromo Internacional do Algarve – known more colloquially as Portimao, after the port city it sits half an hour outside – was opened on the 2nd of November, 2008. The circuit was inaugurated by WorldSBK when they headed to Portugal for their final round of that season – but it’s not just a racetrack. The Algarve Motorsports Park is a state-of-the-art complex which boasts the stunning race track, a go-kart track, an off-road park, a hotel, an apartment complex, a technology park and a sports complex – it really is the bee’s knees.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2314
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 289: Nunes vs. Aldana
programme.desc: Prelims - In a year of excellence, Mexico may see its fourth world champion crowned. In the UFC’s return to Canada on June 10, Guadalajara’s Irene Aldana challenges Brazil’s Amanda Nunes for the UFC bantamweight title in the main event of UFC 289 at Vancouver’s Rogers Arena. Last July, the “Lioness” evened the score with Julianna Pena, regaining her title and setting up a meeting with Aldana, whose fight-altering power has led her to wins over Macy Chiasson, Yana Santos and Ketlen Vieira. Plus, in the co-main event, it’s a pivotal clash in the lightweight division when former champ Charles Oliveira battles surging contender Beneil Dariush

programme.title: UFC 289: Nunes vs. Aldana
programme.desc: Main Event - In a year of excellence, Mexico may see its fourth world champion crowned. In the UFC’s return to Canada on June 10, Guadalajara’s Irene Aldana challenges Brazil’s Amanda Nunes for the UFC bantamweight title in the main event of UFC 289 at Vancouver’s Rogers Arena. Last July, the “Lioness” evened the score with Julianna Pena, regaining her title and setting up a meeting with Aldana, whose fight-altering power has led her to wins over Macy Chiasson, Yana Santos and Ketlen Vieira. Plus, in the co-main event, it’s a pivotal clash in the lightweight division when former champ Charles Oliveira battles surging contender Beneil Dariush
